article.title: Welcome to the El Paso, Texas and New Mexico U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.short_title: El Paso, Texas and New Mexico USEAC Homepage
article.summary: Learn more about the El Paso, Texas and New Mexico U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
â€‹

The El Paso, Texas and New Mexico U.S. Export Assistance Center (USEAC) is committed to assisting American exporters pursue business opportunities in global markets. The El Paso USEAC is part of an international network of global professionals located in 70 countries. Our network specializes in connecting American manufacturers with international partners through partner searches, trade missions, trade shows, contact lists, and direct contact.

The El Paso U.S. Export Assistance Center is also in excellent position to assist manufacturers interested in selling products to the maquiladora industry in Juarez, Chihuahua. For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, please contact Robert Queen atrobert.queen@trade.gov.
